testcase.classname: User could register with a new account
testcase.name: User can create new account using valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to Register Page........................................passed And User selects a gender Type "Male".......................................passed And User Enters Firstname "Abdulrahman" and Lastname "Ayman"................passed And User Select His date of birth Day "1" Month "10" Year "1997"............passed And User Enters Email Address "Test1@example.com"...........................passed And User fills Password fields "Password123" "Password123"..................passed When User Clicks on Register Button.........................................passed Then User directed to successful register page "https://demo.nopcommerce.com/registerresult/1?returnUrl=/".passed And A success Message is displayed "Your registration completed"............passed And The color of Success Message should be "rgba(76, 177, 124, 1)"..........passed

testcase.classname: User should be able to Login to his account
testcase.name: User could Login Using Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to Login Page...........................................passed And User Enters a valid Email address "Test1@example.com"...................passed And User Enters a valid Password "Password123"..............................passed When User Clicks on Login Button............................................passed Then User should be directed to Home Page "https://demo.nopcommerce.com/"...passed

testcase.name: User can Select Euro Currency For shopping
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to Login Page...........................................passed And User Enters a valid Email address "Test@example.com"....................passed And User Enters a valid Password "Password123"..............................passed When User Clicks on Login Button............................................passed Given User Navigates to Home Page...........................................passed When User Selects "Euro" Currency from Dropdown list........................passed Then Prices of Displayed products should be in "€" Currency.................passed

testcase.name: User can Select Euro Currency For shopping 2
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to Login Page...........................................passed And User Enters a valid Email address "Test@example.com"....................passed And User Enters a valid Password "Password123"..............................passed When User Clicks on Login Button............................................passed Given User Navigates to Home Page...........................................passed When User Selects "US Dollar" Currency from Dropdown list...................passed Then Prices of Displayed products should be in "$" Currency.................passed

testcase.classname: User can hover to different categories and select sub categories
testcase.name: User can hover to computer category and select Desktops sub-category
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to Login Page...........................................passed And User Enters a valid Email address "Test@example.com"....................passed And User Enters a valid Password "Password123"..............................passed When User Clicks on Login Button............................................passed Given User Navigates to Home Page...........................................passed When User Hovers to Computer Category.......................................passed And User Selects Desktops sub-category......................................passed Then User should be directed to sub-category page "https://demo.nopcommerce.com/desktops".passed

testcase.name: User could select a slider and navigate to the product page in the slider

failure.message: User doesn't Navigate to product page expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/]

testcase.failure:
Given User navigate to Login Page...........................................passed And User Enters a valid Email address "Test@example.com"....................passed And User Enters a valid Password "Password123"..............................passed When User Clicks on Login Button............................................passed Given User Navigates to Home Page...........................................passed When User Select Slider "0".................................................passed And User Clicks on the product Link in the Slider "0".......................passed Then User should be directed to the product page "https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020".failed
